remarks: A Kolmogorov quotient of a regular space is Hausdorff.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
statement:
kqval.2 $e |- F = ( x e. X |-> { y e. J | x e. y } ) $.
regr1lem2 $p |- ( ( J e. ( TopOn ` X ) /\ J e. Reg ) -> ( KQ ` J ) e. Haus ) $.
$d J x y $.
$d X x y $.
$d x y $.
$d x y $.
